entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 near noon then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
